title: r/Relationships My Young Nephew Keeps Trying To Sleep With Me, His Aunt
description: r/Relationships_Advice In today's episode, OP is confronted with a real pickle (so to speak). Her young teenage nephew has suddenly developed a huge crush on her, and he's begun to act in really inappropriate ways around her. He makes flirty comments, takes opportunities to touch her, and tries to be around her as much as possible. OP wants to behavior to stop, but she doesn't want to ruin the kid's reputation in the family by bringing his parents into it. What should she do?
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
